entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 23. POP 30%
